item.title: The Earthshot Prize - Report 2024
item.description: The definitive review of the progress made in protecting and restoring the planet in 2024.

item.description: Tess and Claud present the biggest night in the ballroom - the Strictly grand final.

item.description: A special recording of Macnificent, Michael McIntyre's latest worldwide sold-out show.

item.description: When Claire starts hearing an incessant rumbling sound, no-one seems able to help.

item.description: Susan Ryeland is brought back to England to help with the case of a missing woman.

item.description: Thirty-two ambitious chefs battle it out to become the 2024 champion.

item.description: Eddie Redmayne stars as an assistant who worked with Marilyn Monroe (Michelle Williams).

item.description: An assortment of ageing Brits retire to a hotel in India.

item.description: When Kate meets Tom, her life takes an upward turn. But is it too good to be true?

item.description: Needing work, Larry joins a New York museum where the exhibits come to life after sunset.

item.description: A teacher (Martin Freeman) is put in charge of his school's version of the Nativity.

item.description: Peter Parker wants people to forget he is Spider-Man, but Dr Strange’s spell goes wrong.

item.description: It’s the 1980s in Stavanger, and Norway’s oil industry is booming.

item.description: Howard is smuggling a huge load of cannabis into the US. Will he cash in or get caught?

item.description: Is Severn Trent's record really as good as it appears? Reporter Joe Crowley investigates.

item.description: Rylan is in Los Angeles for an intimate and exclusive sit-down with Mariah Carey.

item.description: DJ Target, Krept and Konan launch the sixth season, with guest mentor Fumez the Engineer.

item.description: Michelangelo struggles to make his name in the brutal world of Renaissance Italy.

item.description: Josh is keen to move to the next level with Fola. But Fola wants to take things slowly.
